coupon.sys.core.connectionPool

Class ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.connectionPool.ConnectionPool

  • public class ConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Class manage pool of the connections to Data Base (get/return connection)
    Author:
    vbronshtein

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAllConnection()
      Close all pool SQL Connections ( if all connections is in pool , method will close all immediately , otherwise wait for 30 sec and then close all connection using helper backup pool )
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Get SQL Connection from pool ( connection removed from pool on return action ) Method is synchronize (wait until connection pool have connection )
      static ConnectionPool getInstance()
      Get SQL Connection from pool of connections
      int poolSize()
      Check current pool size
      void returnConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Return Connection to pool ( and notify all all wait connections ) Synchronize method

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConnectionPool getInstance()
        Get SQL Connection from pool of connections
        Returns:
        instance - SQL Connection

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws CouponSystemException
        Get SQL Connection from pool ( connection removed from pool on return action ) Method is synchronize (wait until connection pool have connection )
        Returns:
        return Connection to Data base
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException

      • returnConnection

        public void returnConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
        Return Connection to pool ( and notify all all wait connections ) Synchronize method
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection to DataBase.

      • poolSize

        public int poolSize()
        Check current pool size
        Returns:
        number of Available connections

      • closeAllConnection

        public void closeAllConnection()
                        throws CouponSystemException
        Close all pool SQL Connections ( if all connections is in pool , method will close all immediately , otherwise wait for 30 sec and then close all connection using helper backup pool )
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException
